thread.title: Ken Nnamani’s committee to hold zonal public hearing
thread.title_full: Ken Nnamani’s committee to hold zonal public hearing

author: Tony
title: Ken Nnamani’s committee to hold zonal public hearing
text:
Home » News » Ken Nnamani’s committee to hold zonal public hearing Ken Nnamani’s committee to hold zonal public hearing On 10:21 pm In News by Tony Comments 
By Ben Agande, Abuja 
THE Senator Ken Nnamani committee on Electoral reforms is to conduct public hearing in the six geopolitical zones inn the country to get inputs from Nigerians on how best to reform the electoral process to engender free and fair elections in the country. 
The zonal public hearings, which according to a member of the committee who spoke with Vanguard in Abuja yesterday, ‘will begin to hold in the next few weeks” after necessary logistics have been put in place by the committee. 
The member who does not want to be named for this report because he is not authorised to speak on the matter explained that since its inauguration in October last year, the committee has been working behind the scene to ensure that it delivers on its mandate.
